Description: Order your companion to follow you.
Name: Follow

Description: Allow your companion to make his own decisions in battle.
Name: Free Stance

Description: Order your companion to focus on defensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the Defender skill tree.
Name: Defender Stance

Description: Order your companion to focus more on offensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the Attacker skill tree.
Name: Attacker Stance

Description: Order your companion to stop fighting and concentrate on healing maneuvers, using only actions learned from the Healer skill tree.
Name: Healer Stance
